thread.title: pamela webb
thread.title_full: Apricot Power reviewed by pamela webb

author: pamela webb
title: pamela webb
text: I love the ease of browsing and ordering. Delivery is quick. I don't know about the product quality yet because it's too soon. I got a little discount email after I ordered but I don't need to order before it expires. I need a discount that works for a month. The other place we used is a few dollars higher but I can get a discount or coupon that works for each order. That's all I didn't like about that and the fact the kernels should be cold and they sit in a hot mail box for a few hours before I get them.
